title: S13 Ep33: Life After Death:  The Case for Scientific Proof
itunes:title: Life After Death:  The Case for Scientific Proof
description:
Neuroscientist Robert Davis joins Beyond The Darkness to talk about his latest book and the most recent experimental and anecdotal evidence into life after death. Dr. Davis also explores the potential for an afterlife through the analysis of case studies, interviews, and researched findings of near-death and out-of-body experiences, mediumship, apparitions, psychic explanations, and reincarnation..

https://bobdavisspeaks.com/

Get the book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio
